Summary Note:
Sofía Dácil Gómez and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Madrid. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
Sofía Dácil Gómez is a 34 year old Family Office Manager from Spain.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Sofía Dácil Gómez and Díaz tied the knot in 2025. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Sofía completed her secondary education at Instituto de Bachillerato Artístico IES Reina Sofia Tenerife in 2010.
Sofía completed her university studies at University of Seville in 2013.
Occupation History:
Sofía Dácil Gómez is a 34 year old and comes from Spain.
At CaixaBank S.A., Sofía Dácil Gómez held the position of Family Office Manager from 2015 till now, developing essential skills in the field.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 30000 EUR.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Jerez de la Frontera and Gijón, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.

Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Corporate Lawyer, she received an inheritance of 2710000 EUR in 2017, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
